title: Walloon Brabant
extract:
Walloon Brabant is a province of the Wallonia region of southern Belgium.


Cities

 

1 Incourt 
2 Jodoigne 
3 Louvain-la-Neuve — A newly built university town.
4 Villers-la-Ville — Home to the Villers Abbey, one of the most beautiful ruins of Belgium.
5 Waterloo — Famous for the Battle of Waterloo, the battlefield area is the most visited in the province.
6 Wavre 


Other destinations


Understand


Get in


Get around


By public transport
TEC buses service most parts of the province.


See


Do
1 Walibi (train station Bierges-Walibi). The largest theme park of Walloon Brabant, and one of the larger ones of Belgium, famous for its roller coasters (most notably the new for 2021 Kondaa, an Intamin mega coaster among the best in the world, Vampire, an inverted Vekoma coaster, and werewolf, the largest wooden roller coaster in the country). (updated Nov 2022)


Eat


Drink


Stay safe


Go next
Head to the capital city of Belgium, Brussels.
Namur — the capital of the Wallonia region is also very closeby.
